濙字的基本解释

濙
yíng
古同“濴”。

濙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yíng］
［《廣韻》烏迥切，上迥，影。］
(1)小水。
(2)见“濙濙”。

濙字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　濙； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页655第28
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?烏迥切，音瑩。濎濙，小水貌。【揚雄·甘泉賦】梁弱水之濎濙兮。【註】濙，絕小水也。　又【集韻】【韻會】?扃切【正韻】于平切，?音熒。義同。　又瀅濙，水回旋貌。【杜甫詩】洪波左瀅濙。　【集韻】熒㶈滎瀅音義同，?烏迥切。

濙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
濙字的起名意思

暂无。

Xi
Basic explanation of words
Xi
yíng
Gu Tong "shui".
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yíng］
["Guangyun" Wu Jiong cut, Shang Jiong, shadow. ]
(1) Xiaoshui.
(2) See "Yi Ye".
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　濙; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 655 28
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Wu Jiong cut, Yin Ying.濙濙, small water appearance. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】Liang Weak and squishy by water. [Note] Xi, absolutely Xiaoshui.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Fengqie [Zhengyun] Yu Pingqie,? Yinying. The same meaning.　Yang Ying, the water swirling appearance. [Poems of Du Fu] Hong Bo Zuo Ying Lian.　 [Ji Yun] Ying 㶈 Ying Ying has the same sound and meaning,? Wu Jiong cut.

Name meaning
Nothing.
yíng
to revolve; to curl in eddies, as rushing water
